name: purescript-docs-search
description: Search frontend for the documentation generated by the PureScript compiler.

scripts.build-app: npm run bundle-app && npm run parcel-app
scripts.add-shebang: echo "#!/usr/bin/env node" > dist/purescript-docs-search && cat dist/main.js >> dist/purescript-docs-search
scripts.build-main: npm run bundle-main && npm run parcel-main && npm run add-shebang && rm dist/main.js && npm run chmod-main
scripts.build: spago build && npm run build-app && npm run build-main
scripts.build-dev: spago build && npm run build-app && npm run bundle-main && npm run add-shebang && rm dist/main.js && npm run chmod-main
